thread.section_title: Cottman of Wheat Ridge Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cottman of Wheat Ridge | www.cottmanofwheatridge.com
thread.title: Michael Astuto
thread.title_full: Cottman of Wheat Ridge reviewed by Michael Astuto

author: Michael Astuto
title: Michael Astuto
text:
Thank you Cottman of Wheatridge and especially Scott Cooper for your
efficiency and professionalism and detailed explanations on the Transmission repair for my 2002 Dodge Ram 1500. I have used 2 other transmission repair shops in the Denver area, (AC, and Cliffs), and you
guys are the best. Quality and Efficiency defines your shop.
Thanks, Michael Astuto 1/26/2017
